Hello world!
Settings
Dashboard
Report Dashboard
Sales Report
Travel Plan
Sales Step 2
18. Conducting of Training and Staff Meeting / Memimpin Training dan Briefing Pramuniaga
19. Store Cleanliness / Memastikan Semua Sisi Toko Dalam Keadaan Bersih
20. Offering Hosiery (Socks, Polish, etc) / Menawarkan Barang2 Kecil (Kaos Kaki, Semir, dll)
21. Cashiers Desk Area Tidy and Clean / Tempat Meja Kasir Rapi dan Bersih
22. Used Standard Uniform and Bata Shoes / Berseragam Rapih dan Memakai Sepatu Bata
23. Having Sls Est. Prs/TO/NFW/Reduce Article / Memiliki Anggaran Psg/Rupiah/BK/Artikel PH
24. Grooming, Tyding and Dusting Selling Area / Merapikan Pajangan, Menyapu Ruang Penjualan
25. Cleaning Pavement / Memiliki Area Tugas Bersih2 Tersendiri
26. Not Sitting, Chatting, Use HP in Selling Area / Tidak Duduk, Ngobrol, Main HP Diruang Penjualan
27. Inviting Customer to The Shops or Cuap - Cuap / Memanggil Konsumen Masuk ke Dalam Toko
28. Window Display are Perfectly Done as per VM Guide Book (if any) / Pajangan Etalase (bila ada) tertata dengan baik sesuai petunjuk buku pemajangan VM
29. Display in Selling Area are Clean Grouping by Gender/Category Section Following VM Guide Book
30. Massive/High Density Display for Promotion Articles at 1st 3 Meter Prime Selling Area
31. Socks Panel and Footwear Care Centre Well Displayed and Merchandised / Panel Kaos Kaki, Aksesoris dan Produk Perawatan Sepatu Lainnya Terpajang dan Mudah dijangkau Konsumen
32. Bata Happy Feet 5 Steps with Every Customer (SS offering a second pair, shoe care and sundries)
33. Happy Feet 5 Steps Training/Review to All Sales Staff (simulative training by DSM)
34. Through Out Review of Stock Statement (STAAT) Column by Column and Row by Row
35. Slow Moving Items Reviewed. Action taken in Liaison with Merchandising Department
36. Red Dot Article are Marking and Implement FIFO (First to Sell is Red Dot)
37. Complete Review of Stock Room Setup and Organization Zone
38. Signage in Perfect Condition (Clean, Well Painted, Lighting Up)
39. Frontage of Store, Flooring in Selling Area, Celling are in Good Condition and Clean
40. Fixtures, Sitting Stool, and Furniture, Bracket, Gondola are in Good Condition and Well Maintained
41. Fire Extinguishers in Good Working Condition and Not Expired Yet
42. Visual Merchandising Display Guide Book - both Regular and Promotion VM are available
43. Retail Dealer - 5 Files are Available and Complete / 5 File Pengecer Khusus ada dan Lengkap
44. Copy of RD Agreement are Available in 5 Files RD / Ada Photo Copy Perjanjian Kerja Pengecer Khusus di File 5 RD
45. Info Area are Available and Update / Terdapat Papan Informasi dan Diperbaharui dengan Info Terkini
46. Happy Feet 5 STEPs Poster are Available / Terdapat Poster 5 Langkah Penjualan dan Ditempel dengan Rapih
47. Zero Tollerance are Laminated and Paste on The Readable Well
48. Retail Dealer Hand Book are Available and in Good Condition
49. Expenses Policy as Per Circular No. 35/40 are Available in 5 Files RD
50. POS, Scanner, Receipt printer are Available and in Good Condition
ADMINISTRATION / PEMERIKSAAN ADMINISTRASI
